ValidationRule.description: Ensures reasonable square footage based on property type
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Square_footage__c)), OR( AND(TEXT(Property_Type__c) = "Single Family", Square_footage__c < 500), AND(TEXT(Property_Type__c) = "Condo", Square_footage__c < 300), AND(TEXT(Property_Type__c) = "Commercial", Square_footage__c < 1000) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Square footage seems too small for the selected property type
